actions.text: Reported to Senate from the Select Committee on Ethics, S. Rept. 95-448.

official_title: A resolution amending S.E. 110, 95th Congress, to establish January 1, 1978 as the effective date for public financial disclosure by Senate Members, candidates, officers and certain employees.

summary.text: Amends Senate Resolution 110 (95th Congress) to establish January 1, 1978, as the effective date for public financial disclosure by Senate Members, candidates, officers, and certain employees. Amends rule XLII of the Standing Rules of the Senate (as amended by Senate Resolution 110 (95th Congress) to exempt qualified blind trusts from the reporting requirements of the Rule. Sets forth the requirements which must be met by a trust to qualify for such exemption. Stipulates that the proposed trust instrument and trustee be approved by the Senate Select Committee on Ethics.

titles.title: A resolution amending S.E. 110, 95th Congress, to establish January 1, 1978 as the effective date for public financial disclosure by Senate Members, candidates, officers and certain employees.
